name: Star Trek Generations: Beyond the Nexus
name_original: Star Trek Generations: Beyond the Nexus
description: Star Trek Generations: Beyond the Nexus is a Star Trek video game released for the Nintendo Game Boy and Sega Game Gear in 1994. It was developed under the title "Star Trek the Next Generation: The Advanced Holodeck Tutorial", changing to its final title just prior to release. It was both developed and published by Absolute Entertainment.
